css:
/*
 * Your Stylesheet
 *
 * This stylesheet is loaded when Atom starts up and is reloaded automatically
 * when it is changed and saved.
 *
 * Add your own CSS or Less to fully customize Atom.
 * If you are unfamiliar with Less, you can read more about it here:
 * http://lesscss.org
 */
/*
 * Examples
 * (To see them, uncomment and save)
 */
atom-text-editor::shadow .cursor {
  border-color: red;
}
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode.is-focused::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode.is-focused::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode.is-focused::shadow,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode.is-focused,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode.is-focused,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode.is-focused {
  /* cursor color */
}
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode.is-focused::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode.is-focused::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode.is-focused::shadow .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.normal-mode.is-focused .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.operator-pending-mode.is-focused .cursor,
atom-text-editor.vim-mode.visual-mode.is-focused .cursor {
  background-color: red;
  visibility: visible !important;
}
